file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: support+api+documentation@qovery.com
    name: Qovery Product Team
    url: https://www.qovery.com
  description: |
    - Qovery is the fastest way to deploy your full-stack apps on any Cloud provider.
    - ℹ️ The API is stable and still in development.
  title: Qovery API
  version: 1.0.3
  x-logo:
    url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qovery/public-resources/master/qovery_new_logo_white.svg
    altText: Qovery
servers:
- url: https://api.qovery.com
security:
- bearerAuth: []
tags:
- name: Account
- name: Account Info
- name: Application
- name: Application Actions
- name: Application Configuration
- name: Application Database
- name: Application Deployment rule
- name: Application Deployment History
- name: Application Environment Variable
- name: Application Event
- name: Application Logs
- name: Application Main Calls
- name: Application Metrics
- name: Application Secret
- name: Applications
- name: Backups
- name: Billing
- name: Cloud Provider
- name: Cloud Provider Credentials
- name: Clusters
- name: Custom Domain
- name: Database
- name: Database Actions
- name: Database Application
- name: Database Event
- name: Database Main Calls
- name: Database Metrics
- name: Databases
- name: Dependency
- name: Environment
- name: Environment Actions
- name: Environment Deployment History
- name: Environment Deployment Rule
- name: Environment Logs
- name: Environment Main Calls
- name: Environment Secret
- name: Environment Variable
- name: Environments
- name: Git
- name: Git repositories
- name: Logical Database
- name: Members
- name: Organization
- name: Organization Main Calls
- name: Project
- name: Project Deployment Rule
- name: Project Environment Variable
- name: Project Main Calls
- name: Project Secret
- name: Projects
- name: Referral & Rewards
paths:
  /organization:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganization
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponseList'
          description: List organizations
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List user organizations
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    post:
      operationId: createOrganization
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponse'
          description: Create organization
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization name is already taken
      summary: Create an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
  /organization/{organizationId}:
    delete:
      description: To delete an organization you must have the admin permission
      operationId: deleteOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    get:
      operationId: getOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponse'
          description: Get organization by ID
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization by ID
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    put:
      description: To edit an organization you must have the admin permission
      operationId: editOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationEditRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponse'
          description: Edit an organization
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization name is already taken
      summary: Edit an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
  /organization/{organizationId}/member:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationMembers
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/MemberResponseList'
          description: Get members
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization members
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/member/{userId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: User ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: userId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Remove a member
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/inviteMember:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationInvitedMembers
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberResponseList'
          description: Get invited members
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get invited members
      tags:
      - Members
    post:
      operationId: postInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberResponse'
          description: User invited
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: User already invited
      summary: Invite someone in the organization
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/inviteMember/{inviteId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Remove an invited member
      tags:
      - Members
    post:
      operationId: postAcceptInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invite ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: inviteId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberResponse'
          description: User invited
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: User already invited
      summary: Accept Invite in the organization
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/transferOwnership:
    post:
      operationId: postOrganizationTransferOwnership
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TransferOwnershipRequest'
      responses:
        "204":
          description: no content
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Transfer organization ownership to another user
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/currentCost:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationCurrentCost
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationCurrentCostResponse'
          description: Get Cost
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization current cost
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCode:
    post:
      operationId: addCreditCode
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationCreditCodeRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: add credit code
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add credit code
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster/{clusterId}/currentCost:
    get:
      description: |
        Get your cluster cost range. We are unable to give a precise cost of your infrastructure at the moment.
        But Qovery guarantees that the cost of your cluster will not exceed the max range.
      operationId: getClusterCurrentCost
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Cluster ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: clusterId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CostRangeResponse'
          description: Get cluster cost
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get cluster current cost
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/billingInfo:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationBillingInfo
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfoResponse'
          description: Get Billing Info
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization billing info
      tags:
      - Billing
    put:
      operationId: editOrganizationBillingInfo
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfoRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfoResponse'
          description: Edit billing info
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit Organization Billing Info
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/billingStatus:
    get:
      description: |
        This endpoint returns a "is_valid" boolean field reflecting the billing status of the organization:
        - If true, the organization billing is valid
        - For Startup organization, it returns false if there is at least 1 invoice unpaid since 1 week
        - For Community organization, it returns false if there is no credit left
      operationId: getOrganizationBillingStatus
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingStatus'
          description: Get Billing Status
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization billing status
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceResponseList'
          description: List Invoices
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization invoices
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice/{invoiceId}:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invoice ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceResponse'
          description: Get Invoice
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization invoice
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice/{invoiceId}/download:
    get:
      description: This will return URL of the invoice PDF
      operationId: getOrganizationInvoicePDF
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invoice ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/LinkResponse'
          description: Get invoice PDF
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get invoice link
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/downloadInvoices:
    post:
      operationId: organizationDownloadAllInvoices
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "202":
          description: You will receive an email containing your invoices
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Download all invoices
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCard:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationCreditCards
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardResponseList'
          description: List cfredit cards
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization credit cards
      tags:
      - Billing
    post:
      operationId: addCreditCard
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardResponse'
          description: Add credit card
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add credit card
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCard/{creditCardId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteCreditCard
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Credit Card ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: creditCardId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete credit card
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/project:
    get:
      operationId: listProject
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectResponseList'
          description: List projects
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List projects
      tags:
      - Projects
    post:
      operationId: createProject
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectResponse'
          description: Create project
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Project name within the organization is already taken
      summary: Create a project
      tags:
      - Projects
  /organization/{organizationId}/project/stats:
    get:
      description: Returns a list of project ids, and for each its total numberof
        services and environments
      operationId: getOrganizationProjectStats
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectStatsResponseList'
          description: Get number of services
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List total number of services and environments for each project of
        the organization
      tags:
      - Projects
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationCluster
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterResponseList'
          description: List clusters
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization clusters
      tags:
      - Clusters
    post:
      operationId: createCluster
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterResponse'
          description: Create cluster
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a cluster
      tags:
      - Clusters
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster/status:
    get:
      description: Returns a list of clusters with only their id and status.
      operationId: getOrganizationClusterStatus
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterStatusResponseList'
          description: Get statuses
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List all clusters statuses
      tags:
      - Clusters
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster/{clusterId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteCluster
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Cluster ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: clusterId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete a cluster
      tags:
      - Clusters
    put:
      operationId: editCluster
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Cluster ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: clusterId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterResponse'

              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RewardClaimResponse'
      responses:

      example:

        state: INITIALIZED
        message: message
        service_deployment_status: NEVER_DEPLOYED
      properties:
        id:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        state:
          description: |
            Status is a state machine. It starts with `BUILDING` or `DEPLOYING` state (or `INITIALIZED`if auto-deploy is deactivated). Then finish with `*_ERROR` or any termination state.
          enum:
          - INITIALIZED
          - BUILDING_QUEUED
          - BUILDING
          - BUILD_ERROR
          - BUILT
          - DEPLOYMENT_QUEUED
          - DEPLOYING
          - DEPLOYMENT_ERROR
          - DEPLOYED
          - STOP_QUEUED
          - STOPPING
          - STOP_ERROR
          - STOPPED
          - DELETE_QUEUED
          - DELETING
          - DELETE_ERROR
          - DELETED
          - RUNNING
          - RUNNING_ERROR
          - CANCEL_QUEUED
          - CANCELLING
          - CANCEL_ERROR
          - CANCELLED
          type: string
        message:
          description: message related to the state
          nullable: true
          type: string
        service_deployment_status:
          enum:
          - NEVER_DEPLOYED
          - UP_TO_DATE
          - OUT_OF_DATE
          nullable: true
          type: string
      required:
      - state
      type: object
